name: Lightning Snares
prereq: Quick Snares; Snare Specialist; Master In Crafting
summary: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.
description:
You can rig a trap with incredible speed. When you create a snare that normally takes 1 minute to Craft, you can Craft it using a single Interact action instead.Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.
